issue.title: [Rust] Update take() kernel with support for large lists
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10378](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10378). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `take()` kernel currently supports arrays with the `List` type ([here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/eea8d352bf3196a29c1ccf5e6c7342913916048a/rust/arrow/src/compute/kernels/take.rs#L130)), but not `LargeList`. Update `take()` to support `LargeList`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10378?focusedCommentId=17227779) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8556
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8556>
